description: C compiler failure during configuration: cannot create executables. Possible issues with compiler installation or environment setup.
Incompatible pointer types in ZopfliCompress calls: argument 6 type mismatch. Requires pointer type adjustment in woffEncode and woffSetMetadata functions.
Implicit declaration of 'swab' function in fixio.c. Missing header inclusion or obsolete function usage causing build failure.
GCC internal error during GIMPLE pass (predicate_for_phi_result) when compiling ARM NEON test code. Likely compiler bug or unsupported code pattern.
Unhandled Python exception in Meson build system configuration. Indicates a Meson bug requiring upstream reporting.
CMake minimum required version compatibility error: CMake <3.5 no longer supported. Requires update to cmake_minimum_required syntax.
CMake configuration failure due to outdated cmake_minimum_required syntax. Requires version specification update for modern CMake.
Permission denied during systemd-analyze verify in %check phase: Failed to create /run/systemd/ directory in buildroot environment.
